    18. 2209.11656 The kagome metals RbTi$_3$Bi$_5$ and CsTi$_3$Bi$_5$ (kagome, arXiv)

    20. 2209.11246 Neutron Depolarization due to Ferromagnetism and Spin Freezing in CePd$_{1-x}$Rh$_x$ (Ce, arXiv)
